articles.title: Inspiration4's Hayley Arceneaux will be youngest American to reach space and 1st spaceflyer with a prosthesis - Space.com
articles.description: Inspiration4 will make history in multiple ways.
articles.content:
This week, a crew of four spaceflyers will launch as part of the first all-civilian mission to Earth orbit. But this isn't the only major "first" for Inspiration4

articles.title: Indian American Teens From Illinois Spread Awareness About ADHD, Bust Myths - The Quint
articles.description: The girls through posters around community spaces and by collaborating with organisations like the CHADD, try to give information so that kids needing medical attention can access it at a younger age. It is important that they start treatment early.
articles.content: People think kids are just behaving badly, that these kids dont listen to their parents, said Gulnaz. There is a negative perception and societal stigma around the condition, she added. That is exact… [+536 chars]
